2. If the county names match, find the row where "county" equals "centru".
3. In the row corresponding to "centru", check the value under the column "percent of total exports". This will give us the percentage of total exports for the "centru" county.
4. Compare this value with 13.8%. If they match, proceed to step 5. Otherwise, the claim is FALSE.
5. In the row corresponding to "centru", check the value under the column "percent of total imports". This will give us the percentage of total imports for the "centru" county.
6. Compare this value with 11.2%. If they match, the claim is TRUE. Otherwise, the claim is FALSE.
